channel.title: [PI] Curses Please help Definitely Rep++

item.title: [PI] Curses Please help Definitely Rep++
item.dc:creator: @nearfatality nearfatality
item.description:
@nearfatality wrote:

It first I got 85 Errors and now I got 15. I am following a Tutorial here: http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/315208-pi-curses-done-right.html

Iâ€™ve tried everything I know. What can I do to fix this? I will Rep++ anyone who will help me (Must be on topic)

My Error:

src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3222: ')' expected attack += (int)(attlvlForXP * .10 c.getatt); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3222: illegal start of expression attack += (int)(attlvlForXP * .10 c.getatt); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3222: ';' expected attack += (int)(attlvlForXP * .10 c.getatt); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3225: ')' expected defense += (int)(deflvlForXP * .10 c.getdef); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3225: illegal start of expression defense += (int)(deflvlForXP * .10 c.getdef); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3225: ';' expected defense += (int)(deflvlForXP * .10 c.getdef); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3228: ')' expected strength += (int)(strlvlForXP * .10 c.getstr); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3228: illegal start of expression strength += (int)(strlvlForXP * .10 c.getstr); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3228: ';' expected strength += (int)(strlvlForXP * .10 c.getstr); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3231: ')' expected range += (int)(ranlvlForXP * .10 c.getran); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3231: illegal start of expression range += (int)(ranlvlForXP * .10 c.getran); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3231: ';' expected range += (int)(ranlvlForXP * .10 c.getran); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3234: ')' expected magic += (int)(maglvlForXP * .10 c.getmag); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3234: illegal start of expression magic += (int)(maglvlForXP * .10 c.getmag); ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:3234: ';' expected magic += (int)(maglvlForXP * .10 c.getmag); ^ 15 errors Press any key to continue . . .

My Code:

if(c.prayerActive[36]) { // Leech Attack attack += (int)(attlvlForXP * .10 c.getatt); } if(c.prayerActive[39]) { // Leech Defense defense += (int)(deflvlForXP * .10 c.getdef); } if(c.prayerActive[40]) { // Leech Strength strength += (int)(strlvlForXP * .10 c.getstr); } if(c.prayerActive[37]) { // Leech Ranged range += (int)(ranlvlForXP * .10 c.getran); } if(c.prayerActive[38]) { // Leech Magic magic += (int)(maglvlForXP * .10 c.getmag); }

Read full topic
